text: Interstate 155 (I-155) is an east–west auxiliary Interstate that goes in the U.S. states of Missouri and Tennessee. The highway is long. The highway connects I-55 with Dyersburg, Tennessee. I-155 is the only road that directly connects Missouri and Tennessee, using the Caruthersville Bridge over the Mississippi River. ==References== 155 Category:Transport in Missouri Category:Geography of Missouri Category:Transport in Tennessee Category:Geography of Tennessee
title: Interstate 155 (Missouri–Tennessee)
